articles.description: MUMBAI: Irrfan Khan's son Babil has been posting a lot of unseen pictures and videos of the late actor on social media. On Tuesday, Babil shared a new video of Irrfan with his fans. In the video, the "The Lunchbox" actor is seen taking a dip in ice-cold water…

articles.title: Delhi HC refuses to restrain Netflix web series ‘Hasmukh’ from airing series - The Indian Express
articles.description: Dismissing the plea for interim injunction, the court remarked that granting it “would amount to interference in the freedom of speech and expression guaranteed by our Constitution.”
articles.content: Hasmukh is now streaming on Netflix. (Source: Netflix)Observing that the very essence of democracy is that a creative artist is given the liberty to project the picture of the society in a manner he perceives, the Delhi High Court Tuesday refused to restrain … [+1515 chars]
